dotJS 2013

04 December 2013
written by Max Boll

It's been a while since my last development conference. I was lucky to get one of the last super-late bird tickets for the dotJS conference in Paris, France. As it predicts, it's all about javascript and similar web-technologies. Tim and I have teamed up and went to Paris together to meet Lucas for the first time and of course to go to that conference.

Deploy Jekyll via Rakefile

25 November 2013
written by Max Boll

Your website is built of Jekyll? Your server doesn't support Ruby? Therefore you can't host you site? Well, exactly this was my case. I found a gem called Capistrano, which is for website deployment but this thing seemed just too big for my needs. Anyway, I managed to push this Jekyll website on my server with just a single command. This is how I did it.
